page.title: 12CHURCHES, HATCH END, HARROW.
page.content: {Hatch End Free Church}is a small {Baptist}church built in 1936. The minister is Reverend Reginald King. The number of marriages averages 8 or 9 per year. The people normally make their baptisms in their early or late teens. There have been 2 baptisms so far this year; the average is between 3 and 4. Members contribute to the upkeep of the church and give money for home and overseas missions. There are two services every week. {St. Teresa's Roman Catholic Church was built in 1954. The parish priest is Father Leslie Cole. The average weekly attendance is 436. There are 20 baptisms and 9 marriages a year. The average weekly collection of Â£300 goes towards the upkeep of the church and there are other collections for special causes. All of the 6 weekly masses are said in English.
